name: Galaxy-defender
tagline: Defend the galaxy from the invading aliens
body:
### Galaxy Defender
Defeat the aliens and protect the Galaxy in this Galaga inspired game. Shoot down aliens and destroy bosses to protect the Galaxy. You are the last line of defense. Don't let the aliens get past you!

### Instructions
Move with left/right arrows

Shoot with space bar

Collect coins and kill aliens and survive as long as you can

Use your coins and XP to unlock new ships and perks to help you survive longer

### Credits
All code and images created by Slapshot135

### Suggestions?
I am constantly looking to make new updates and am open to suggestions as to what to add next. Email me your ideas at gitslapshot135@gmail.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
